description: Updates the read and write permissions for an analysis.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the analysis whose permissions you're updating. You must be using the Amazon Web Services account that the analysis is in.

parameters.name: AnalysisId
parameters.description: The ID of the analysis whose permissions you're updating. The ID is part of the analysis URL.

parameters.name: GrantPermissions
parameters.description: A structure that describes the permissions to add and the principal to add them to. (dict) --- Permission for the resource. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following: The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.) The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Principal
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

parameters.name: RevokePermissions
parameters.description: A structure that describes the permissions to remove and the principal to remove them from. (dict) --- Permission for the resource. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following: The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.) The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Principal
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

nested_items.name: AnalysisArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the analysis that you updated.

nested_items.name: AnalysisId
nested_items.description: The ID of the analysis that you updated permissions for.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: A structure that describes the principals and the resource-level permissions on an analysis.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:
The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.)
The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.)

The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.)

nested_items.name: Actions
nested_items.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
